amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that any savings realized as a result of shifting to civilian employees from contractors within the Department of Defense be directed towards deficit reduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in House Report 112-88 to require any savings as a result of shifting to civilian employees from contractors within the Department of Defense be directed towards deficit reduction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Himes amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 240 (Roll no. 350).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Himes amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 240 (Roll no. 350).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Himes.
